welcome_benefits: Earn 2,000 Reward Points; BookMyShow movie voucher worth ₹200 on card activation

Movie & Dining: BOGO offer on movie tickets through BookMyShow worth ₹200
Rewards Rate: 2 RP for every ₹100 spent online; 1 RP for every ₹100 spent offline

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver up to ₹100 on transactions between ₹500 to ₹4,000
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the cash amount or a minimum of ₹500

product_details: 2,000 Reward Points and a complimentary movie ticket as a welcome benefit.
